mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_title, notice_content) values(#{noticeNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_write_date desc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, notice_content=#{noticeContent}, notice_write_date=systimestamp
mapper.select: select * from notice where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${column} asc, notice_write_date desc

select * from notice
where ${column} like #{keyword} || '%'
order by notice_write_date desc
